repos.name: fp-atr-ble1
repos.description: The FP-ATR-BLE1 is STM32Cube function pack function pack for asset tracking using BLE&NFC connectivity for SensorTile.box PRO discovery box The purpose of this functional pack is to provide simple asset tracking application for STEVAL-MKBOXPRO Pro that could be controlled by Bluetooth and NFC connectivity.

repos.name: fp-atr-sigfox1
repos.description: FP-ATR-SIGFOX1 is a STM32Cube Function Pack that lets you read data from GNSS and environmental sensors and send this information via a Sigfox connectivity. Message sending is triggered by either user button pressing, by timer event or by threshold crossing events on environmental values or movement detection by the on-board accelerometer.

repos.name: fp-aud-aec1
repos.description: FP-AUD-AEC1 STM32Cube Function Pack for Acoustic Echo Cancellation is a specific example fully focused on Acoustic Echo Cancellation and provides an implementation of a USB smart speaker use case with microphone. Please check st.com where a more recent version of the software might be available.

repos.name: fp-aud-smartmic1
repos.description: FP-AUD-SMARTMIC1 provides a firmware running on STM32 which acquires audio signals of four digital MEMS microphones, elaborates them by means of embedded DSP libraries and streams the processed audio to both an USB host and a loudspeaker. Please check st.com where a more recent version of the software might be available.

repos.name: fp-ind-datalogmc
repos.description: The FP-IND-DATALOGMC function pack for STEVAL-STWINBX1 and EVLSPIN32G4-ACT is a powerful integrated toolkit for the next generation of smart actuators. It is derived from FP-SNS-DATALOG2 function pack and it allows the collection of heterogeneous data. Please check st.com where a more recent version of the software might be available.

repos.name: fp-sns-allmems1
repos.description: The FP-SNS-ALLMEMS1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets you connect your IoT node to a smartphone via BLE with a Androidâ„¢ or iOSâ„¢ application, such as the STBLESensor app,  to view real-time environmental and inertial sensors data, digital microphone and battery level and you can record them on SD card. Advanced functionality are available.

repos.name: fp-sns-datalog1
repos.description: The FP-SNS-DATALOG1 function pack provides a comprehensive solution to save data from any combination of sensors and microphones configured up to the maximum sampling rate available on STWIN and SensorTile.box

repos.name: fp-sns-datalog2
repos.description: The FP-SNS-DATALOG2 function pack represents an evolution of FP-SNS-DATALOG1 and provides a comprehensive solution for saving data from any combination of sensors and microphones configured up to the maximum sampling rate. Please check st.com where a more recent version of the software might be available.

repos.name: fp-sns-flight1
repos.description: FP-SNS-FLIGHT1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets you connect your IoT node to a smartphone via BLE with a Androidâ„¢ or iOSâ„¢ application, such as the STBLESensor app, to view real-time time-of-flight sensors data. NDEF standard is used for Bluetooth pairing, storing the necessary information on the NFC tag.

repos.name: FP-SNS-MOTENV1
repos.description: FP-SNS-MOTENV1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets you connect your IoT node to a smartphone via BLE with a Androidâ„¢ or iOSâ„¢ application, such as the STBLESensor app, to view real-time environmental and inertial sensors data. This package also enables advanced functions such as the sensor data fusion, activity recognition, etc.

repos.name: fp-sns-motenvwb1
repos.description: The FP-SNS-MOTENVWB1 is an STM32Cube function pack, which lets you connect your IoT node to a smartphone via BLE with a Androidâ„¢ or iOSâ„¢ application, such as the STBLESensor app, to view real-time environmental, inertial and time-of-flight sensors data. The package also enables advanced functionality such as sensor data fusion, carry position, etc.

repos.name: fp-sns-smartag2
repos.description: The FP-SNS-SMARTAG2 is an STM32Cube function pack. Thanks to this package you can read the ambient light, motion and environmental sensor data on your IoT node by the means of an NFC enabled reader, such as a mobile phone or tablet, throught a suitable AndroidST or iOST application such as the ST Asset Tracking and ST NFC

repos.name: fp-sns-stbox1
repos.description: The FP-SNS-STBOX1 is STM32Cube function pack for the Pro Mode of wireless multi sensor development kits The purpose of this functional pack is to provide simple applications and examples that show how to build custom applications for STEVAL-MKSBOX1V1, STEVAL-MKBOXPRO and STEVAL-STWINBX1 boards.
